parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter by user creation start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter by user creation end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: Keyword for searching users by name, email, or phone

parameters.name: review_keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search within review comments

parameters.name: frequency_visit
parameters.description: Filter users based on visit frequency

parameters.name: duration_in_minute
parameters.description: Filter by booking duration in minutes

parameters.name: date_filter
parameters.description: Filter bookings by date (e.g., today, this_week, previous_week, this_month, etc.)

parameters.name: last_visited_date
parameters.description: Filter users by last visited date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Sort order for users (ASC or DESC)
